site.page.manage_events.title: Park volunteer activities
site.page.landing.hero.headline: Take part in volunteer activities
site.page.landing.hero.introduction: The City of Helsinki has supported volunteer activities organised by local residents since 1984. The City of Helsinki supports volunteer activities by lending equipment and removing the litter that has been collected. More than 20,000 local residents take part in these volunteer activities each year. Notify about your own park volunteer activity today!
site.page.landing.hero.call_to_action: Take part in a volunteer activity!
site.page.landing.hero.button: Notify about a new park volunteer activity
site.page.thank_you.header: Thank you for notifying about a new activity
site.page.thank_you.paragraph: Your notification has been added to the service. You will receive a confirmation message and further information about practical arrangements as soon as we have reviewed the details in your notification. Together we can create an even better urban environment!

site.report.title: Spring cleaning activities
form.validation.string.matches: The field must be in the given format!
form.validation.string.email: The field must be an e-mail address!
form.validation.map: Select a place on the map
form.validation.contract_zone: Volunteer activities are not possible in this area.
form.event.new.info:
Equipment will be delivered to the agreed location before the start of volunteer activities and picked up again afterwards together with the litter that has been collected. 

The system will automatically assign an address according to the location of the volunteer activities, but the equipment can also be delivered elsewhere. In addition to the address, you can provide a description of the location. For example: Castréninkatu 4, Toinen Linja playground, by the entrance to the building. If the volunteer activity takes place on a weekend, the equipment will be delivered on the preceding weekday and picked up on the following weekday.
form.event.modify.heading: Edit activity
form.event.new.heading: Notify about a new park volunteer activity
form.event.new.location_instructions:
Select a district and then mark the location on the map. 
You can also enter the exact address.
